name: Pirate's Curse
description:
Arrggghhh!!!  Pirate v. Pirate 2D side-scroller. The curse is real. Try and break the curse......if ye can! Bwahahaha!!!! ....yarrgghh...

Watch "The Making of Pirate's Curse" on Youtube

Thanks for playing and please comment below to let me know what you think of the game.
